segments.text: Can you help me plan the office party ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . What do you need the most help with , the food or entertainment ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , well , let's coordinate our efforts . Should this party be formal or casual ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think it should be casual .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I agree . Next , we have to decide on food . We have a choice of Chinese or Continental Cuisine . Which one should we have ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I would prefer Chinese food for this party .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Perfect choice . For music , should we have a live band or a DJ ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think we should hire a live band .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK then . Well , I will work on my part and get back to you with my progress on Friday .
segments.speaker: S2
